author: julianfoad
msg: A follow-up to r1081342.  Rename svn_wc__node_get_children2() and
svn_wc__db_read_children2() to more descriptive names, to distinguish them
more clearly from the previously existing functions, because these new
functions are not directly replacing them.

provide the various outer wrapper structs and args.
